# Commit Message Instructions for PEMIClientEase.UI

## Format

Use the conventional commit format:

<type>(<scope>): <subject>

<body>

<footer>

## Types

- feat: New feature or component
- fix: Bug fix
- refactor: Code refactoring without functional changes
- style: Formatting, styling (CSS/Tailwind/PrimeNG theme changes)
- test: Adding or updating tests
- docs: Documentation changes
- chore: Build config, dependencies, tooling
- perf: Performance improvements
- ci: CI/CD pipeline changes

## Scope Examples

- component: `landing-page`, `stepper-container`, `responsive-header`
- service: `account-type`, `content-header`, `stepper-form`
- core: `guards`, `interceptors`, `constants`
- config: `app-config`, `routes`, `build`
- shared: `components`, `directives`, `models`
- styles: `tailwind`, `primeng`, `global`

## Subject Guidelines

- Use imperative mood: "add", "fix", "update", not "added", "fixes", "updating"
- Keep under 72 characters
- Don't end with a period
- Be specific about what changed

## Body (Optional but Recommended)

- Explain why the change was made, not just what
- Reference architectural decisions from `.github/copilot-instructions.md`
- Mention if change affects:
  - Signals/state management
  - Routing or providers
  - Accessibility (AXE/WCAG compliance)
  - PrimeNG theme or Tailwind configuration
  - Docker/nginx deployment

## Footer

- Reference TODO comments if preserving or resolving them
- Note breaking changes: `BREAKING CHANGE: description`
- Link related issues: `Closes #123`, `Refs #456`

## Examples

### New Feature

feat(onboarding-form): add coinvestor form dialog component

Implement standalone dialog component for coinvestor data entry.
Uses PrimeNG Dialog with reactive forms and signal-based state.
Follows OnPush change detection strategy.

### Bug Fix

fix(stepper-container): resolve navigation state sync issue

Step navigation wasn't updating when using browser back button.
Now uses router state and signals for synchronization.

### Refactoring

refactor(services): migrate from constructor to inject() function

Update all core services to use inject() instead of constructor
injection per Angular 19 best practices. No functional changes.

### Style Changes

style(responsive-header): update mobile breakpoint styles

Adjust Tailwind responsive classes for better mobile UX.
Ensures WCAG AA contrast ratios maintained.

### Configuration

chore(deps): upgrade PrimeNG to 19.0.9

Update PrimeNG and @primeng/themes for Angular 19 compatibility.
Update CustomPreset in core/constants/preset accordingly.

## Project-Specific Rules Preserve TODOs: If code has TODO comments, mention in commit body Branch context: Commits should align with `<Name>_PEMIClientEaseUI_Dev` branch workflow Standalone components: Always note if adding/updating standalone components Signals: Mention when introducing or refactoring signal-based state Accessibility: Flag AXE/WCAG-related changes explicitly Build impact: Note if changes affect `angular.json`, `tailwind.config.js`, or PostCSS
